articles.title: Chinese AI startup DeepSeek launches enhanced V3 AI model with China-made chip support and faster speeds
articles.summary: Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek has rolled out an upgraded version of its flagship model, underscoring the country’s broader effort to cut reliance on U.S. technology. The new release, called DeepSeek-V3.1, adds support for China-made chips and promises faster processing speeds. While DeepSeek’s upgrade, shared in a WeChat post that isn’t publicly accessible, Reuters confirmed

articles.title: AI Is Accelerating the Fourth Turning’s Institutional Meltdown
articles.summary: Learn how AI (Artificial Intelligence) is transforming our world amidst crisis, from exciting innovations to serious societal implications.
articles.translated_title: AI Is Accelerating the Fourth Turning’s Institutional Meltdown

articles.title: Google to offer Gemini AI to U.S. government agencies for 47 cents
articles.summary: The U.S. government struck a deal with Google to use its artificial intelligence and other applications for 47 cents, underbidding other AI partners.
articles.translated_title: Google to offer Gemini AI to U.S. government agencies for 47 cents
articles.translated_summary: The U.S. government struck a deal with Google to use its artificial intelligence and other applications for 47 cents, underbidding other AI partners.

articles.title: Can the AI Boom Save DePIN Tokens? Why Investors Like Render, Akash, and Bittensor, Despite Underperformance In Bitcoin Bull Market
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence is arguably the favorite investor story in traditional markets today, but the Web3 investor world has no intent to sit this one out despite not yet enjoying the fruits of the Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) bull market.
articles.translated_title: Can the AI Boom Save DePIN Tokens? Why Investors Like Render, Akash, and Bittensor, Despite Underperformance In Bitcoin Bull Market

articles.title: Anthropic in Talks to Raise Up to $10 Billion in New Funding
articles.summary: Anthropic is nearing a deal to raise as much as $10 billion in a new round of funding, according to people familiar with the matter, a higher than expected sum and one of the largest megarounds to date for an artificial intelligence startup.
articles.translated_title: Anthropic in Talks to Raise Up to $10 Billion in New Funding
articles.translated_summary: Anthropic is nearing a deal to raise as much as $10 billion in a new round of funding, according to people familiar with the matter, a higher than expected sum and one of the largest megarounds to date for an artificial intelligence startup.

articles.title: The startups threatened by Epic's new AI
articles.summary: All the artificial intelligence news out of Epic's big customer event in Wisconsin. Plus: Great stories about the impacts of CGMs and AI scribes.

articles.title: Tech giants prepare to challenge state AI regulations
articles.summary: Tech companies including OpenAI, Meta Platforms Inc. and Alphabet Inc.'s Google are revving up to block US states from regulating their fast-moving and lucrative artificial intelligence businesses.
articles.translated_title: Tech giants prepare to challenge state AI regulations
articles.translated_summary: Tech companies including OpenAI, Meta Platforms Inc. and Alphabet Inc.'s Google are revving up to block US states from regulating their fast-moving and lucrative artificial intelligence businesses.

articles.title: OpenAI Model Earns Gold-Medal Score at International Math Olympiad and Advances Path to Artificial General Intelligence
articles.summary: OpenAI researchers reveal how their experimental model, devoid of any external aids, powered through hours-long proofs to earn a gold-medal score at the International Math Olympiad, discuss the project’s origins and describe how such work could help lead to artificial general intelligence
articles.translated_title: OpenAI Model Earns Gold-Medal Score at International Math Olympiad and Advances Path to Artificial General Intelligence

articles.title: Google's Pixel 10 phone raises the ante on artificial intelligence
articles.summary: Google on Wednesday unveiled a new line-up of Pixel smartphones injected with another dose of artificial intelligence that’s designed to do everything from fetch vital information stored on the devices to help improve photos as they’re being taken
articles.translated_title: Google's Pixel 10 phone raises the ante on artificial intelligence

articles.title: Study finds AI tools may weaken physician skills to detect cancer
articles.summary: Study finds that artificial intelligence exposure may reduce doctors' cancer detection rates during standard colonoscopies by 6%, raising concerns about AI dependency.
articles.translated_title: Study finds AI tools may weaken physician skills to detect cancer
